DOC.brief_summary: This study determine clinical neuroimaging characteristic Transient Ischemic Attacks Korean population .
DOC.brief_title: Korean Transient Ischemic Attack eXpression Registry
DOC.criteria: Clinical symptom sign consistent transient ischemic attack Subject admit hospital within 24 hour symptom onset Subjects underwent MRI ( include diffusionweighted image ) MRA ( CT angiography ) Transient neurological symptom due Migraine aura Basilar migraine Seizures Syncope Peripheral vertigo Transient global amnesia
